class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">why </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#2cff7c">ceased </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">wonder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span style="color:#ec88ff">explain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8028ff">separate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b06030">anguish </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span
